mapper.select: select * from (select c.zrecognizetime,d.zid,d.zname,f.zname grade_name from zstudent_login c,zstudent_schedule a,zschedule b ,zstudent d,zgrade f where d.zgradeID=f.zid and b.zid=a.zscheduleID and b.ztrainingroomID=#{ztrainingroomID} and d.zid=c.zstudentID and c.zstudentID=a.zstudentID and c.zrecognizetime BETWEEN '2020-11-01' and NOW()) m ORDER BY m.zrecognizetime DESC
